RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENSAS ALL OURS took command soon the start, rated while setting a pressured pace early, shrugged off nearest pursuer to quickly extended advantage through the second turn still lightly in hand, not threatened through the stretch to win geared down and ridden out. KAT'S SOLDIER broke back, void of early foot, began a four wide advance onto the backstretch, chased winner into the stretch, proved no match for that one to the wire, clearly second best. R T'S IRON MAN last to leave, raced back early, floated out five wide into the lane when making a modest rally, finished up best of the rest. ANGOLA VACATION raced in the second flight, came up empty for the drive. INDEFENSIBLE TOWN raced back and outside, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while not a serious threat. GLITTER STORM moved up to press the issue while well wide early, continued outside, lost contact with the winner far turn, gout out to be four wide into the lane, continued to back up top to the wire. DIXIELAND STORMING away in good order, settled in mid pack for four furlongs then began to fade.

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas All Ours
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, rated, extended, geared down late

ENTRY.NAME: Kat's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of early foot, advanced 4w,no match,clr 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dixieland Storming
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for a half, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Angola Vacation
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Iron Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, floated 5w into stretch,finished best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Glitter Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to press well wide, got out 1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Indefensible Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back, picked off couple of tiring rivals

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 72. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIREINTHESTORM broke outward but on top, showed the way up the backstretch, shook off a rival turning for home, larger lead a furlong out, held the runner up comfortably safe late. AHIMAAZ off a step slow to trail early, came five wide for the drive, rallied willingly down the center of the course to be in time for the place. TIZ THE BIG ONE sandwiched at the start, lacked speed toward the inside, steered out when straightened for home, staged a mild rally inside the runner up, was unable to match that rival late while prevailing for the show. HALF MAGIC bumped at the break, one paced early, closest to the inside while in the second flight turning for home, chased the winner past the furlong marker, went flat late to be caught for the runner up spot. TEXAS TURBINE in the second flight outside, was four wide into the lane, also lacked a closing kick. MR LIBERTY went one paced to lack a rally. KAHAAL broke out to bother a couple of outer rivals, chased the winner for three furlongs and gave way. FREEWHEELER forwardly placed early off the inside, bore out through the turn to fall back, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Fireinthestorm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear early, shook off foe, clear again, held

ENTRY.NAME: Kahaal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, chased for three furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz the Big One
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sandwiched start, lacked speed, steered out, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Half Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk, one pace early, inside turn, flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Freewheeler
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, bore out turn, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Nirvana Farm LLC and Minten Craig
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Ahimaaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, back, 5w rally, willingly 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Turbine
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w into lane, lacked kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOEY'S GAME back off the pace while between rivals, asked along in the two path turning for home, split foes when straightened in upper stretch, late surge to be up in time. PUTTHEHAMMERDOWN void of speed while off the inside, was four wide and outside the winner turning into the straight, unable to keep up with that one late, up for the place in the final strides. OLDER AND WISER also was outrun in the early, made a five wide move to challenge far turn, showed the way into the stretch, led late, failed to contain the top two. TRADER PRICE broke on top, dueled up front closest to the inside, vied midway on the far turn, began to weaken soon after and continued to gradually give way through the stretch. PAYOFF CYCLE within striking distance off the inside, challenged four wide and between horses far turn, had little left for the stretch run. CAJUN CONNECTION four wide into the first turn when forwardly placed, continued to prompt the issue up the backstretch in the three path, brief bid three wide and between horses with three furlongs to run, faltered in the drive. CARLOS'S MAMA finished early, not a threat. DEMON HUNTER used away from the gate to duel in the two path, stopped second turn, well beaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace btwn,asked far turn, split foes 3/16, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos's Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Trader Price
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Demon Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: used early to duel off rail, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Putthehammerdown
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w into lane, late rally, up 2nd final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Older and Wiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 5w move far turn, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w into 1st, prompted leaders, 3w bid btwn foes far turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Payoff Cycle
ENTRY.OWNER: Lange I L and Credeur Don
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w far turn, little left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAITIN' ON A WOMAN settled off the pace while out in the strip, four wide exiting the turn, roused, idled past the furlong marker, late push in the waning strides to be up in time. CUSTOM BLUE GRASS away in good order, stalked the leaders up the backstretch, advanced and challenged three wide into the stretch, got out a bit in upper stretch, clear a furlong out, led until very late, nailed final strides. GALAXY BUILDER lacked early foot while racing outside, four wide out of the turn, continued rally mildly to be well clear of the others, no threat to the top pair. DUKE OF BLUE RIDGE broke on top, dueled up front off the inside, gave way into the stretch. CHARLIE'S TOWN narrowly set the pace for a half along the inside, faltered. HEARTTHROB HALO broke outward and a bit slow, trailed for a half, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. KING MARVIN failed to menace. ZENDELPHIAN staged a steady retreat and finished far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, stalked, 3w bid into lane,got out 3/16,nailed

ENTRY.NAME: King Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Heartthrob Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out and last, trailed, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set pace inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Waitin' On a Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace 3w, 4w into lane, roused, late push, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Zendelphian
ENTRY.COMMENT: staged a steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Blue Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled off the inside, gave way into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Builder
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot outside, 4w into lane,mild rally, no match top2

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD THREE YEAR OLDS, 118 LBS.; OLDER, 123 LBS.(PREFERENCE TO HORSES THAT HAVE NOT STARTED FOR LESS $20,000). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSTIC CREED came in slightly just after the start to brush with the runner up, moved up to narrowly set the pace from between foes after the start, dueled into the turn, shook clear into the stretch and steadily drew away to win ridden out. THISONEISFORYOU brushed slightly just after the start with the winner, dropped inside, raced in the second flight along the inside up the backstretch and through the turn, proved no match for the winner through the lane, held sway for the place. EXPECT A DANCER in the second group outside the runner up and between rivals, fell back off that one when straightened for home, was slowly getting back to that same for late while also no match for the winner. AVIE J lacked speed while four wide into the turn, improved position with some mild interest in the final furlong. GOLD PLUS prompted the issue early from the three path, began a steady retreat before three furlongs. BANK ON IT pressed the winner from the outside for three furlongs and gave way. MEAN DREAMER broke with the leaders, fell back to trail before a quarter, always outrun. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE TRAINER OF THE RUNNER UP AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE OUT OF THE GATE WAS NOT ALLOWED. PER RULING DATED 7/26/23 FRONM THE LOUISIANA STATE RACING COMMISSION (RULING #25401), MYSTIC CREED WAS DQ'D DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back early, trailed in

ENTRY.NAME: Thisoneisforyou
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk, 2nd flight inside, no match

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Mystic Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to narrowly set pace, drew away, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Bank On It
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed four three furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Expect a Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group between foes, slowly getting to runner up

ENTRY.NAME: Avie J
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed four wide, improved with mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace three wide, retreated

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG MONEY MACHINE with the early pace along the inside, dueled onto the backstretch, held a narrow advantage into the far turn, disposed of that foe soon after, was joined by the runner up turning into the stretch, headed, regained the advantage a furlong out and was edging away late in a game effort. MIAS MOONBEAM lacked speed, moved out, advanced four wide into the contention by early in the far turn, engaged the leader late in that bend, put a head in front,continued on equal terms past the furlong marker, outkicked in the late going, fully extended to hold the place. HUMPHREY settled in mid pack while off the inside, roused three wide into the lane, finished with good energy to be getting to the top two late. TWITTY CITY broke back, lacked speed, raced four wide when put to pressure turning for home, displayed some mild interest to improve position. TAKEN BACK last to leave, devoid of any early foot, continued to lag into the far turn, came on the outside for the drive, found best stride too late while improving position. GETCHA raced in mid pack while out in the strip, lacked a closing kick. BAND BOSS chased the dueling leaders, began a steady fade before a half. OVERTHOUGHT dueled up front outside the winner for five furlongs and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Money Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, dueled, shucked foe,2nd duel, game rail

ENTRY.NAME: Twitty City
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 4w into lane, mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Mias Moonbeam
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, moved out, 4w advance, bid, led, outgamed drive

ENTRY.NAME: Taken Back
ENTRY.OWNER: Landry Judy and Landry Robert J
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Band Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Getcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack while outside, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Overthought
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off the inside, gave way 2nd turn

ENTRY.NAME: Humphrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Westmark Richard N and Westmark Mary S
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, roused 3w into lane, getting to top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 22, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 22, 2023 Allo wed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARLIE T away in good order, dueled up front for almost three furlongs in the two path, gained a slightly larger advantage late in the turn, responded when confronted by the runner up from the outside soon after, spirited stretch duel, proved best in determined fashion. EVE'S DELIGHT chased the dueling leaders, moved out, challenged three wide and outside the winner into the lane, extended duel to the wire, outgamed to miss late. FINAL QUEST one paced outside, proved no match for the top two through the stretch. BROKE FINANCING last to leave, trailed most of the way and failed to menace. CONDESA'S HANDMAID dueled up front inside the winner for almost three furlongs, first to blink.

ENTRY.NAME: Condesa's Handmaid
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, first to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Eve's Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased dueling leader, 3w bid, long drive, outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Broke Financing
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed most of way, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Final Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced outside, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie T
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, dueled up front, larger lead, 2nd duel,gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLAMOROUS STAR broke back, lacked speed, moved outside, five wide into the lane, challenged just inside the furlong marker while widest, wore down the leader late under firm handling. SAINT MARY with the pace while racing closest to the inside, headed while continuing to vie through the turn, regained a slight advantage when straightened for home, showed the way until the final strides before giving way stubbornly to the winner. TAKING PICTURES off the early pace and the inside, ranged up to challenge while four wide through the turn, failed to sustain that effort through the stretch, narrowly gained the nod for the show. GYPSY JACKPOT vied up front while horses, continued to contest the issue through the turn, equal terms with the winner past the furlong marker, gradually weakened late, narrowly missed the show. LA LOLA broke in, was quickly straightened to set or force the pace for almost five furlongs, caved in stretch. HALO'S SONG off a bit slow when bothered slightly, continued to trail, five wide into the lane, failed to muster a rally while drifting in.

ENTRY.NAME: Glamorous Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, unhurried, 5w into lane, bid 1/8, wore down leader

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Mary
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Creek Stud LLC and Roven John
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, headed, regained rail, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front between horses, weakened bit late,missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Taking Pictures
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the early pace, 4w move turn, hung in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Halo's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered bit, off slow, trailed, 5w 1/4, no kick while drifting

ENTRY.NAME: La Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, vied up front 3w, caved in drive
